forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h, becoming WSW and increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph, becoming WSW and increasing to 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
